name: Portrait of André-Antoine Bernard, called Bernard de Saintes
description: Portrait of André-Antoine Bernard, called Bernard de Saintes; Jacques-Louis David (French, 1748 - 1825); July 24, 1795; Pen and Indian ink and gray wash, heightened with white gouache, over pencil; 18.1 cm (7 1/8 in.); 95.GB.37; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Portrait of André-Antoine Bernard, called Bernard de Saintes
medium: Pen and Indian ink and gray wash, heightened with white gouache, over pencil
